answers.answer: does he have ascites as this could have an infection in it.  If he has diabetes, there could be gastroparesis.  Finally, it can sometimes be related to the medications that he is taking.

question: my husband has hep c, non alc fatty liver,cirrhosis,enlarged spleen. Last week his ALT was 158(12/13 it was 318) AST 156 (283 in 12/13) ALP 149, GGT 251 ( 344 in 12/13)total bill 1.6(1.1 in 12/13). Does this mean he is getting better? He also has continued vomiting + 2wks time. Dr doesn't seem to know why he is vomiting. Endo and colonoscopy showed nothing.
title: Do these results mean He is getting better?
